title.value: PARTICULARS TO APPEAR ON THE OUTER PACKAGING

p.span: powder and solvent for solution for injection
(recombinant coagulation factor VIII, Fc fusion protein)
1 powder vial contains 250 IU efmoroctocog alfa (approx. 83 IU/mL after reconstitution)
sucrose, sodium chloride, histidine, calcium chloride dihydrate, polysorbate 20, sodium hydroxide, hydrochloric acid.
Powder and solvent for solution for injection
Content: 1 powder vial, 3 mL solvent in pre-filled syringe, 1 plunger rod, 1 vial adapter, 1 infusion set, 2 alcohol swabs, 2 plasters, 1 gauze.
Read the package leaflet before use.
An instructional video on how to prepare and administer ELOCTA is available by scanning the QR code with a smartphone

title.value: 6. SPECIAL WARNING THAT THE MEDICINAL PRODUCT MUST BE STORED OUT OF THE SIGHT AND REACH OF CHILDREN

p.span: Keep out of the sight and reach of children.
Keep the vial in the outer carton in order to protect from light.
Can be stored at room temperature (up to 30°C) for a single period up to 6 months. Must not be returned to refrigerator after storage at room temperature. Date removed from refrigerator:

title.value: 10. SPECIAL PRECAUTIONS FOR DISPOSAL OF UNUSED MEDICINAL PRODUCTS OR WASTE MATERIALS DERIVED FROM SUCH MEDICINAL PRODUCTS, IF APPROPRIATE
11. NAME AND ADDRESS OF THE MARKETING AUTHORISATION HOLDER

p.span: 2D barcode carrying the unique identifier included.

title.value: MINIMUM PARTICULARS TO APPEAR ON SMALL IMMEDIATE PACKAGING UNITS
1. NAME OF THE MEDICINAL PRODUCT AND ROUTE(S) OF ADMINISTRATION
5. CONTENTS BY WEIGHT, BY VOLUME OR BY UNIT
